data.Name: Agency & Trust Agreement
data.Description: Broker company holds beneficial interest in an agreement acquired for Beneficiary until transfer occurs to Beneficiary.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Amending Working Interest Clarification Agreement
data.Description: Used to clarify working interests when the chain of title interests in an agreement (e.g. JOA) cannot be accurately determined.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Asset Sale and Purchase Agreement
data.Description: An assignment of all or part of a person’s interest in a granting instrument relating to an oil or gas concession or part thereof. It is typically used with respect to projects that are in the development and production stage.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Assignment and Novation Agreement
data.Description: A party (assignor) assigns all or a portion of its interest, rights and obligations under an agreement to another party (assignee). The remaining parties (commonly referred to as ‘third parties’) agree to recognize the assignee in place of the assignor and are required to execute the A&N Agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Assignment and Novation and Amending Agreement
data.Description: Assigns and novates the interest of the Assignor to the Assignee with all other partners (Third Parties) consenting to the disposition of Assignor's interest to Assignee. Third Party(s) are signatories to this agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Common Stream Operating Agreement
data.Description: An agreement to support the role of a Common Stream Operator in managing the Product Owner's interest in the streams feeding into and through a production facility like a gas plant.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Concession Agreement
data.Description: A contract that gives a company the right to operate a specific business within a government's jurisdiction or on another firm's property, subject to particular terms.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Confidential Disclosure Agreement
data.Description: A legal contract or part of a contract between at least two parties that outlines confidential material, knowledge, or information that the parties wish to share with one another for certain purposes, but wish to restrict access to.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Confidentiality Agreement
data.Description: A contract through which the parties agree not to disclose information covered by the agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Construction, Ownership & Operating Agreement
data.Description: An agreement that provides for the construction, ownership, and operation of a broad range of facilities.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Consultant Agreement for Business Development
data.Description: An agreement covering advisory services for business development, often in a region where the operator is not familiar with the local legislation and business practices.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Contract Well Operating Agreement
data.Description: A contract between a party who has a few producing wells in an area with an operator who is very active in the same area.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Cross-conveyed Pooling Agreement
data.Description: An agreement to combine land to complete a spacing unit for drilling and production whereby each party assigns an interest in its portion of the DSU to the other party.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Exchange Agreement
data.Description: An agreement for the exchanges of seismic and well data, including provisions for use and protection of cores/samples. [It may]...provide for partner and NOC rights, and transfer provisions for data following farm-in/outs.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Purchase Agreement
data.Description: A type of purchase and sale agreement for data (such as related to wells) in which the buyer is granted non-exclusive use of data delivered by the seller.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Room Agreement
data.Description: A company offering an asset for sale grants to potential buyers access to the relevant data subject to terms including confidentiality and time. The data may not be copied or removed from the premises of the offering company.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Subscription
data.Description: A type of purchase and sale agreement for data (such as related to wells) in which the buyer is granted non-exclusive use of data delivered periodically by subscription.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Trade
data.Description: A type of confidentiality agreement governing the mutual sharing of confidential data between parties.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Transfer Agreement
data.Description: A type of confidentiality agreement governing the sharing of confidential data.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data Use Agreement
data.Description: A type of confidentiality agreement governing the sharing of confidential data.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Emulsion and Water Handling Agreement
data.Description: An arrangement with a Provider to handle/dispose of emulsions and water from the production of oil/gas from well(s) for a fee.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Exploration License
data.Description: A type of tenure agreement whereby a government give private developers certain rights to petroleum and natural gas resources for a period of time and subject to conditions.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Exploration Permit
data.Description: A type of  tenure agreement whereby a government give private developers certain rights to petroleum and natural gas resources for a period of time and subject to conditions.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Farm in Agreement
data.Description: An arrangement whereby an Operator acquires an interest in a lease owned by another Operator.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Farmout Agreement
data.Description: A contract where one party agrees to perform work, usually on the other party’s land holdings, in exchange for an interest in those land holdings.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas Handling Agreement
data.Description: The operator of facility agrees to accept Substances at the Facility Inlet, handle them and deliver Producer Outlet Substances to the Facility Outlet according to conditions and fees.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas Processing Agreement
data.Description: A contract for processing raw gas at a facility. The facility operator is paid for it services by the owners of the gas.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas Sales Agreement
data.Description: An exchange of natural gas at a delivery point for a sum of money. GSAs can also occur along multiple points in the value stream.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas Storage Agreement
data.Description: A gas storage agreement is an exchange of money for the right to store natural gas in a storage facility (typically a depleted salt dome reservoir or water aquifer) over a period of time. It includes payments to the gas storage operator for gas storage services.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas Transportation Agreement
data.Description: An exchange of pipeline capacity or pipeline transporting services for money. The transporter will typically charge a tariff.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Horizontal Well Pooling Agreement
data.Description: An  arrangement for common working interests in a drill spacing unit for a single well with no conveyance. A Production Allocation Unit Agreement (PAUA) or Royalty Allocation Agreement (RAA) may be needed.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: International Dispute Resolution Agreement
data.Description: An enforceable agreement to arbitrate...and a multi-step dispute resolution process that would culminate with arbitration for a binding decision.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: International Unitization and Unit Operating Agreement
data.Description: An agreement for unitizing two blocks under two separate contracts from the same host government.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Joint Operating Agreement
data.Description: A contract between two or more parties which identifies each party’s interest percentage, appoints an Operator and states how maintenance and future operations will be conducted on the jointly-held lands.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Joint Venture Business Agreement
data.Description: A business arrangement among parties to maximize and enhance the value of jointly-owned assets.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Land Lease
data.Description: A lease agreement concerned rights to access and use of surface lands.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Lease Sharing Agreement
data.Description: Sharing use of an existing surface lease area to conduct drill, completion, abandonment operations
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Lifting Agreement
data.Description: A supplement to the JOA that sets out rights, obligations and procedures frequently used by companies in the international petroleum industry for discrete lifting of liquid petroleum produced under a granting instrument.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: LNG Master Sales Agreement
data.Description: Used for spot sales of LNG and will accommodate transportation by the Buyer or by the Seller.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Master Data License Agreement
data.Description: A non-exclusive License to use the Data solely for the purposes of the Licensee's own business operations and not for any other purpose and not for or on behalf of any third party.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Master Road Use Agreement
data.Description: Grants right to Grantee to use roads owned by the Grantor.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Master Road Use Agreement
data.Description: The consent given by one company to allow another company access to drive on its roads for the purpose of drilling a well, constructing a pipeline, etc.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Master Service Agreement
data.Description: A contract... in which the parties agree to most of the terms that will govern future transactions or future agreements. A master agreement permits the parties to quickly enact future transactions or agreements, negotiating only the points specific to the new transactions.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Memorandum of Understanding
data.Description: A type of agreement between two or more parties, indicating an intended common line of action.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Mineral Lease
data.Description: An instrument which sets out the terms by which one party leases the right to explore and produce certain minerals within a specific tract or tracts of land.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Natural Gas Lease
data.Description: Tenure agreements with a government or private mineral right owners (Lessor) give private developers (Lessee) rights to natural gas resources. The agreement is for a period of time (term, usually renewable) and requires exploration or development, and payment of rents and royalties.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Non Cross-conveyed Pooling Agreement
data.Description: An agreement to combine land to complete a spacing unit for the drilling and production of petroleum without the ownership of those rights changing in any way.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Non-Disclosure Agreement
data.Description: A legal contract or part of a contract between at least two parties that outlines confidential material, knowledge, or information that the parties wish to share with one another for certain purposes, but wish to restrict access to.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Notice of Assignment
data.Description: A notice issued by two or more parties where a party assigns all or a portion of its interest, rights and obligations to another party (assignee). The third parties are required to accept such assignment and do not execute the agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Option Agreement
data.Description: A legal contract between two parties whereby, in exchange for a fee, one of the parties has the right but not the obligation to buy or sell a specified item at a specified price, at a specified date.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Pad Site Sharing Agreement
data.Description: An arrangement to share well pads where wells and facilities are not held in common interests, usually to mitigate the environmental footprint and to optimize operating efficiencies.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Petroleum & Natural Gas Lease
data.Description: Tenure agreements with a government or private mineral right owners (Lessor) give private developers (Lessee) rights to natural gas resources. The agreement is for a period of time (term, usually renewable) and requires exploration or development, and payment of rents and royalties.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Pooling Agreement
data.Description: Brings together two or more oil and gas leases covering separately-owned land.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Production Administration Agreement
data.Description: An agreement to allow one company to do the Production Accounting for another company.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Production Sharing Contract
data.Description: An agreement between an operator and a government or government agency on how to allocate production.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Proprietary Information Agreement
data.Description: A legal contract or part of a contract between at least two parties that outlines confidential material, knowledge, or information that the parties wish to share with one another for certain purposes, but wish to restrict access to.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Purchase and Sale Agreement
data.Description: The primary legal contract by which companies exchange oil and gas assets (including stock in an oil and gas business entity) for cash, debt, stock, or other assets.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Royalty Allocation Lease Amending Agreement
data.Description: An agreement to divide the production from a particular well among the mineral leases in which it resides.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Sales and Purchase Agreement
data.Description: A legal contract between two parties that obligates a transaction between a buyer and a seller... The agreement finalizes the terms and conditions of the sale.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Secondment Agreement
data.Description: An attachment to the JOA that sets out rights, obligations and procedures frequently used by companies in the international petroleum industry for non-operating parties to second persons with special expertise to the operator, and to charge the joint account for such secondment.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Seismic Option Agreement
data.Description: Seismic option agreements result from a party obtaining the right to purchase oil and gas interests, conditioned upon the results of a new seismic survey and/or evaluation of existing seismic. Sometimes a cash consideration must be paid for the option.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Service Agreement
data.Description: An agreement covering the provision of services such as advice, information, analysis, maintenance or specialized capability.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Shared Right of Way Agreement
data.Description: Provides shared access to a pipeline right of way to conduct operations
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Site (Surface) Lease Agreement
data.Description: Surface owner (Lessor) grants Lessee access to lands required (outlined in red on an attached survey plan) for the purpose of operations
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Stand Alone Road Use Agreement
data.Description: Grants the exclusive right to use all or a portion of Grantor's road as specified.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Study and Bid Group Agreement
data.Description: Used by parties that wish to agree to do a study and form a bidding group for the purpose of jointly making a bid for a license or contract in response to the opening of a bidding round.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Tie-In Agreement
data.Description: Addresses the activities associated with the connection of a production source, such as a well, to a third party facility.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Trust Agreement
data.Description: A trust is a right to hold the interest by one party for the benefit of another party.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unconventional Resources Operating Agreement
data.Description: An operating agreement covering joint operations in shale oil and gas, tight oil and gas, coalbed methane, and any other unconventional production methodologies involving wellbore operations.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unit Accounting Procedure
data.Description: An agreement, usually part of an overall joint operating agreement, on the rights of a Non-Operator to obtain Joint Account information from the Operator [including]...the audit procedures [and]...the direct charges the Operator may make to the Joint Account.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unit Operating Agreement
data.Description: An agreement made between the working-interest owners and the Unit Operator providing for the apportionment of costs and liabilities incurred in conducting operations and...such other rights and obligations as they deem appropriate.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unitization and Unit Operating Agreement
data.Description: Unitization conditions and unit operating conditions addressed in one agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Wellbore Liability Agreement
data.Description: Each Party, proportionate to its Working Interest in the Well, acknowledges and agrees that it is liable and responsible for the Well in accordance with the provisions of the Operating Procedure.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Asset Sale and Purchase Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AssetSaleAndPurchase" with Name="Asset Sale and Purchase Agreement" instead. An assignment of all or part of a person’s interest in a granting instrument relating to an oil or gas concession or part thereof. It is typically used with respect to projects that are in the development and production stage.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Cross-conveyed Pooling Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="CrossConveyedPooling" with Name="Cross-conveyed Pooling Agreement" instead. An agreement to combine land to complete a spacing unit for drilling and production whereby each party assigns an interest in its portion of the DSU to the other party.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Master Data License Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="MasterDataLicense" with Name="Master Data License Agreement" instead. A non-exclusive License to use the Data solely for the purposes of the Licensee's own business operations and not for any other purpose and not for or on behalf of any third party.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: International Unitization and Unit Operating Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="InternationalUnitizationAndUnitOperating" with Name="International Unitization and Unit Operating Agreement" instead. An agreement for unitizing two blocks under two separate contracts from the same host government.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Non Cross-conveyed Pooling Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="NonCrossConveyedPooling" with Name="Non Cross-conveyed Pooling Agreement" instead. An agreement to combine land to complete a spacing unit for the drilling and production of petroleum without the ownership of those rights changing in any way.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Study and Bid Group Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="StudyAndBidGroup" with Name="Study and Bid Group Agreement" instead. Used by parties that wish to agree to do a study and form a bidding group for the purpose of jointly making a bid for a license or contract in response to the opening of a bidding round.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unitization and Unit Operating Agreement
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="UnitizationAndOperating" with Name="Unitization and Unit Operating Agreement" instead. Unitization conditions and unit operating conditions addressed in one agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
